授業目的: 履修者は研究資料を要約する等の基本的な技能を学ぶ。
到達目標: 研究資料を調査し、個人研究で利用できる高等の研究方法を身につける。
授業方法: Reading and discussion in English with an emphasis on critical reflection.

第1回: course introduction: fundamentals of postgraduate research
第13回: using the internet and promoting your research
トピック.授業外学習2: Homework, usually an academic writing exercise, is given most weeks.

備考　Note
Students write an academic review of a book relevant to their research interests. The review should be in English and between 2,000 and 3,000 words in length. Consideration will also be given to students' homework over the course of the semester.
